member.remarks:
Default Xafari initilization of contains several stages:
AppModule
Try to find AppModule value in section of .config-file. Create instance of from specified module, add it to collection and initialize instance by this AppModule properties values.
ConnectionString
if has null then try to find ConnectionString value in section of .config-file and set founded value to .
Additional modules by filter
if collection is not empty, select all modules in which has any with specified . Then try to load specified by module and add it to collection.
By default, following usage context use
